name: Cengiz Bozkurt
summary: Cengiz Bozkurt. Actor: Leyla and Mecnun. Cengiz Bozkurt was born on 24 December 1965 in Turkey. He is an actor and casting director, known for Leyla and Mecnun (2011), Coming Soon (2014) and Taken 2 (2012).
